EU bank holiday: November 1, 2024 – EUR payments paused
Bitstamp EUR payments will be paused on Friday, November 1, 2024, due to a European public holiday.

Due to an upcoming public holiday on November 1, 2024, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing EUR payments will be paused.

EUR deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Monday, November 4, 2024.

USD and GBP deposits and withdrawals, as well as credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers, will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any assistance, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish all our EU customers a peaceful holiday!
Bank holidays notice: November 1, 2024 – EUR payments paused
